CreateTaskOrder.title: 创建任务订单
CreateTaskOrder.requestParamsDescription:
openconversitionid(String) //主群的ID 和departmentId传一个即可
departmentId(String) //建单传对应的主群id（上线前有固定的主群配置）

[
  {
    "departmentId": 47742592,//建单传对应的主群id（上线前有固定的主群配置）
    "createType": "cusSelf",
    "importantDesc": "",//isImportent 为hurry时需要填写原因说明
    "createSource": "CUS_QUICK",
    "isImportent": "normal",//是否紧急normal或者hurry
    "requestId": "123",//每一次接口调用动态ID
    "productTypeName": "",//问题分类名称
    "customerUserId": "",//无对应的钉钉号不传
    "customerRealName": "王龙",//建单人姓名
    "taskTitle": "测试快手API建单16点32",
    "class": "com.aliyun.dingtalklanding.pop.dto.ddtask.CreateTaskInfoReq",
    "productType": "3270"
  }
]
CreateTaskOrder.responseParamsDescription: 返回结果data 为任务单ID，后续其他接口操作也会用到

QueryTaskInfo.responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Message": "ok", "RequestId": "43135C31-E47A-5AD7-A693-6DC635201CE4", "Data": { "OrderId": "E220303AE1BYY3", "TaskStatus": "dealingNode" }, "Code": "200", "Success": true }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" ok 43135C31-E47A-5AD7-A693-6DC635201CE4 {"taskStatus": "dealingNode","eid": "E21111796147LE",[{{ "senderId": null, "msgType": "template", "msgContent": "{\"title\":\"小二回复\",\"text\": \"小二回复 \\n\\n ###### <font color=#13c2c2>Current handler:王龙</font> \"}", "groupId": "cidXcezGVQJjiWy2PzXylGwvg==", "msgId": null, "id": 27623677, "senderNick": "阿里云服务台", "gmtCreate": 1637138037000, "class": "com.aliyun.dingtalklanding.dto.ChatRecordDTO", "sendTime": 1637138037000, "senderRole": null }}]} 200 true ","errorExample":""}]
QueryTaskInfo.title: 查询任务详情
QueryTaskInfo.responseParamsDescription:
taskStatus（String）：
工单状态：dealingNode:处理中;feedbackNode�:待反馈；forsureNode：待客户确认；temporarySaveNode：暂存

senderId（String）发送人dingUserId 可忽略
msgType（String）消息类型：text（文本）; template（卡片类型消息）；image(图片消息)
msgContent(String) 消息体：text类型直接取值，template类型需处理取text内容
groupId： 消息对应的钉钉子群ID
msgId：消息ID，机器人消息对应为空
senderNick：发送人姓名
sendTime：发送时间
gmtCreate：入库时间
senderRole：发送人角色信息，可忽略

ListProductByGroup.summary: 根据产品组获取产品列表（主要是获取产品id）。

Data.title: data
Data.example: [     {         "classificationProductTypeId":3270,         "classificationProductName":"伏虎测试组",         "classificationProductDesc":"伏虎测试组",         "classificationProductTypeName":"lc-云享咨询",         "id":462,         "enabled":1     } ]

400.errorMessage: The request uses the same client token as a previous, but non-identical request. Do not reuse a client token with different requests, unless the requests are identical.

schema.title: 重开类型
schema.example: 枚举值：6:解决方案无效；7:当前问题仍有疑问需要咨询；8:问题重复出现

400.errorMessage: The request uses the same client token as a previous, but non-identical request. Do not reuse a client token with different requests, unless the requests are identical.

RestOpenTaskOrder.title: 任务单重开
RestOpenTaskOrder.requestParamsDescription:
请求示例：
eid（String）：任务单id（必传）
resetType（重开单原因类型）：枚举值：6:解决方案无效；7:当前问题仍有疑问需要咨询；8:问题重复出现
resetContent （String） ：重开补充说明

400.errorMessage: The request uses the same client token as a previous, but non-identical request. Do not reuse a client token with different requests, unless the requests are identical.

ReplyMessageApi.title: 消息回复
ReplyMessageApi.requestParamsDescription:
eid (String) :任务单id
msgType(String)：消息类型（目前只接收text类型）
userName（String）：发送人姓名（必传）
msgContent（String）：消息内容

请求示例：
[
  {
    "callerParentId": 0,
    "eid": "E21111796147LE",
    "openconversitionid": "",
    "msgType": "",
    "departmentId": "",
    "userName": "王龙",
    "userId": "",//可不传
    "sendTime": 1637201617827,//发送时间
    "msgContent": "测试模拟快手发送消息4",
    "requestId": "123",
    "callerType": "",
    "callerUid": 0,
    "class": "com.aliyun.dingtalklanding.pop.dto.ddtask.AyDdTaskInfoReq"
  }
]

400.errorMessage: The request uses the same client token as a previous, but non-identical request. Do not reuse a client token with different requests, unless the requests are identical.

CloseTaskOrder.title: 关闭任务订单
CloseTaskOrder.responseParamsDescription:
返回失败示例：
{
  "msg": "内部错误",
  "code": "301",
  "data": "任务单状态不是待客户确认",
  "success": false,
  "requestId": "123",
  "class": "com.aliyun.dingtalklanding.pop.dto.PopResultDTO"
}
